About Us

Join our community of learners and start your journey towards success.

33K+
Students Active
Who we are

Leading Education Consultant in India

We aim to provide comprehensive and personalized guidance to students seeking to further their education and career prospects.

As Learning Routes, We offer a broad range of management courses and programs to the management aspirants who cannot go for a regular course or are working professionals. We administer a flawless curriculum with cutting edge technology to the ones who are aspired to have Masters , diploma or certification programs .

Online Courses

Our one-of-its-kind interface offers a plethora of courses that can be pursued flexibly anywhere, anytime.

Upgrade Pesonal Skill

Our seasoned professionals will identify your unique skill set & career goals and will craft a special career plan that is in perfect alignment with your goals and interests.

Build Your Career With 500+ Hiring Partners

Offered courses have onboarded various multinational companies, corporations and start-ups across industries & geographies as hiring partners to provide students and alumni with opportunities that push their potential.

Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.

With the large plethora of management courses in market we guide working professional and aspiring management students through the tiresome process of sorting a relevant management program through our mindful and experienced career counsellors .

Meet our team
